name: Enemy (itch) (Oasez)
description:
This game was made for the Trijam, meaning all the assets and levels were build within a span of 3 hours in the theme "You are the monster"

Enemy is about an enemy who kills all the other guys. You might be wondering, how do we know if we are the enemy? Well it's simple... we're red ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

This game can be played with mouse-only, hope you enjoy!

Programming - Me

Art - Me

Sound effects and music - musicpack
